content:
Hi! I took a stab at making some FSH CPG templates (https://github.com/PuraJuniper/FSH-CPG-templates) based on the work @David Winters and Mick are doing on Cervical Cancer Screening and Management https://github.com/ccsm-cds-tools/ccsm-cds-with-tests

Looking for feedback. Tried to represent the computable PlanDefinition, rulesets, and ActivityDefintion templates for CPGs

Really neat to see a generalized take on what @Michael O'Hanlon and I put together for cervical cancer. For others coming across this, each FSH template includes placeholder elements marked with %% to show potential users what they need to update for their own work. E.g., https://github.com/PuraJuniper/FSH-CPG-templates/blob/main/input/fsh/PlanDefinition.fsh#L1
